allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: KHistoryTracker v1.0

- Interactive Korean history map application
- Timeline slider \(BC 2333 - 2026\)
- Year input feature for quick navigation
- Theme filters \(politics, economy, society, culture, war, people\)
- 32 years, 43 historical events
- Minimal design with clean UI
- Leaflet.js + ESRI satellite imagery

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
